sentences.en: "There are trains straight from Cambridge."— 'I know. but it's no quicker.'
sentences.cn: “有直接从剑桥开出的列车。”——“我知道，但也不快。”
加时赛后，剑桥队以2比0获胜。

sentences.en: He asked me to go to Cambridge with him.
sentences.cn: 他要我和他一起去剑桥。

sentences.en: He has accepted a research professorship at Cambridge University.
sentences.cn: 他接受了剑桥大学的研究员一职。

sentences.en: He reached Cambridge shortly before three o'clock.
sentences.cn: 他快到3点的时候抵达了剑桥。

sentences.en: He rowed No.8 in the Cambridge crew.
sentences.cn: 他是剑桥大学划船队的8号划手。

sentences.en: He was the Master of King's College, Cambridge.
sentences.cn: 他曾是剑桥大学国王学院的院长.

sentences.en: Only the educational elite go 〔 goes 〕 to Oxford or Cambridge.
sentences.cn: 只有学业上的精英才能上牛津或剑桥大学.

sentences.en: She is a student at the University of Cambridge.
The Cambridge University rows against Oxford every year.
sentences.cn: 剑桥大学每年与牛津大学进行划船比赛。

sentences.en: The Cambridge World History of Human Disease is a magisterial work.
sentences.cn: 《剑桥世界人类疾病史》是一部权威著作。

sentences.en: The one thing I look forward to is going punting in Cambridge.
sentences.cn: 我期盼的一件事就是在剑桥乘坐平底船畅游。

sentences.en: They were in disagreement about the move to Cambridge.
sentences.cn: 他们在是否迁居剑桥方面有争议.

sentences.en: to be appointed Professor of French at Cambridge
sentences.cn: 被任命为剑桥大学的法文教授

sentences.en: We motored over to Cambridge to see some friends.
sentences.cn: 我们开车去剑桥看一些朋友.

sentences.en: When I left Cambridge I had a £10,000 overdraft.
sentences.cn: 我离开剑桥时，透支了1万英镑。

sentences.en: When will you go up to Cambridge University?
sentences.cn: 你什么时候去剑桥大学念书?

phrases.tran_cn: 剑桥大学（位于英国的世界著名大学）
